modName: Halo 4 The return of the Forerunner By Shadow0987
summary: Halo 4 The return of the Forerunner By Shadow0987 it makes dwemer Forerunner and makes you feel like you are in Requiem with Crawlers Promethean knights and lot of flying forerunner structures and much more.........
descriptionHtml:
Make sure to click on picture to see what is in the mod ^^^^^
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SdrM0zL.png[/IMG]
[heading] Halo 4 The return of the Forerunner By Shadow0987 [/heading]

NEW MOD COMMING SOON WITH ARMOUR FEATURES
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NY5zelF.jpg[/IMG]

feel free to add images to here or make a video of this mod

If the halo armour did not work you can download it by it\'s self   

to download the sniper rifle it\'s by it\'s self in the download\'s the one that say Dawnguard in the picture 
also
[color=#FFD700] [heading] the newest Update 1.6 [/heading] [/color] 
[heading]newest update on 10:05 PM [8/05/2013] [/heading] 

 Remember to ENDORSE and VOTE ;)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WXswFLL.jpg[/IMG] [color=#ffff00]

======================================================================================
1.6 New Added Johnson off halo 3, master chief, infinity,Master chief crash site, a spartan you can buy armour from only if he is in front or the potion shop, re textured  thieves guild armour added master chief armour and helmet with EVA and recon helmet 
=======================================================================================
1.5 Added battle creek map to skyrim nere whiterun door in on the forerunner structure added halo sniper rifle craft able at forges and added the halo ring replaces the moon  
=======================================================================================
1.4 [New] I have made brutes and added more battles in random caves and ruins. brutes have gravity hammers and I have created a new recipe for energy sword and gravity hammer\'s. they are stronger you are able to craft it in steel section. Big thanks to Kasualty21 and LittleJoeC for the halo weapons model and textures. The recipe\'s are harder to make because of the power the energy sword and gravity hammer have.
=======================================================================================
 1.3 [OLD] Now I have fix up all with Sovngarde and at the portal before you enter Sovngarde. I have a Headquarters for this mod in Markarth when you enter Markarth in the town go right and there should be a new door to the city. I have made map markers to the new ruins I have made also I have made a elite texture and finished Promethean knights sounds. 
=======================================================================================
 1.2   [OLD] Now I have added the middle of the planet and I have renamed Skyrim to Requiem and added phantoms but only 1 I\'m still working on it trying to know how to make those soul gems to shoot also I have added more drop pods and added a new weapon also I can add the world metal planet that you see in the sky on the game but I need you to tell me if I should its a little crap and you can only see it at night look in the pictures.
=======================================================================================
 1.1   [OLD] OK now I have finished the Dyidat and elites forerunners and iv completed elite sounds and Dwarven spider sounds as crawlers note the Dwarven spider sound my be a little crap but are well also I have done where you kill the forerunner its at the place before you enter Sovngarde. 
=======================================================================================
 [/color]
[color=#ffff00] 1.0      [OLD]   New Update available in downloads NOTE the texture pack is not with the esp file because I want to be able to update the mod and not upload the hole thing together. Enjoy
Also delete the old esp in the texture pack file. 
======================================================================================= [/color]
The Promethean Knight is an advanced Forerunner sentinel that appears as an enemy in Halo 4. They deploy Watchers from their carapaces in combat, which increase the survivability of Knights in return.

[NOTE] Try to stay away from the brutes on land they will blow you away and finish you off wile you are getting up. 

Credits
[color=#FFD700] [heading] Big thanks to Kasualty21 and LittleJoeC for the halo energy sword and gravity hammer and sniper rifle and big thanks to nick004 for the moon and 343 industries and the maker of the halo games for the mad halo games and shadow0987 me for the texture of the halo armour and  
jpdoctor for allowing me to put the armour mod in this mod [/heading]

How I\'m trying to make the sphere\'s.  
                                                                             [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6TrLBR0.png[/IMG] 

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/23Aml06.png[/IMG]  
                                   

 [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qk0fxnd.jpg[/IMG]
 [/color]
You May notice that Glados off portal is on here I just felt like making it and I did.
===================================
description
=================================== 

[color=#7FFF00] This mod is still in making but it changes the Dwemer to forerunner and adds forerunner building floating around and Makes Falmer elites with the sounds of elites and Promethean spider sounds have been done and adds more Dwemer and makes you feel like you are in requiem. 

 [/color]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qk0fxnd.jpg[/IMG]
===========================
Still coming
===========================
[color=#00FFFF]
Didact [Done]
Promethean knights [Done]
Promethean knights sounds [Done]
Promethean Crawlers [Done]
Promethean Crawlers Sounds [Done]
Didact ship []
More structures [Done]
Quest []
Promethean sounds [Done]
Elites [Done]
Elites sound [Done]
Elite texture [Done]
Were to kill the didact at the end [Done]
Lot of forerunner int buildings [Done]
Make draugr caves forerunner []
Make Knights Disappear on death []
Infinity ship [Done]
hollow planet [Done]
Cortana []
Promethean Drop pods [Done]
More Promethean\'s on world [Done]
Phantom\'s [Done]
Turret for phantom\'s [Done]
Pelican to travel to Infinity ship [Done]
Rename skyrim to Requiem [did it but for some reason it didn\'t work]
Crashed ships sucked in [Done]
Remodel Dwemer []
Brutes [Done]
energy Sword [Done]
Gravity Hammer [Done]
Halo Moon [Done]
Halo Weapon\'s [Got 3]
Halo warthog
[/color]

Thinking of more. ?
   [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qk0fxnd.jpg[/IMG]


Can any one think of what I should add to it that is possible to do. ?


[color=#7FFF00]  ===============================
my mod page
===============================
[b] Like me at [SKYRIM MODS FOR PC] On FACEBOOK http://www.facebook.com/SkyrimModsForPc [/b]           
 
                                                                       [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oKhgNU2.jpg[/IMG]


Halo is a pretty cool game who agrees.  [/color]
